title: Have better documentation for version support please
body: Talked with @Sarabeth-Jaffe-Microsoft offline about this a little bit. It's quite difficult finding online which MSBuild versions correlate to which VS/.NET/etc. versions.

nodes.body: Team triage: we're happy to take suggestions on https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild but we don't plan to dedicate time to this at the moment.
